Hala Elkoussy (amụrụ na 1974) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Elkoussy na Cairo n'afọ 1974.
Ọ natara onyinye Abraaj Capital Art Prize na Dubai n'afọ 2010. E wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya a kpọrọ Cactus Flower, n'afọ 2017.
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Tate Museum, London, na Art Jameel, Saudi Arabia.
